#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	int N, M;

	scanf("%d %d", &N, &M);

	int C[N + 1][M + 1];

	int foo[N + 1], i = 0;
	int j;

	while (i < N)
	{
		j = 0;
		while (j < M)
		{
			scanf("%d", &C[i][j]);
			j++;
		}
		foo[i] = C[i][0];
		i++;
	}

	bool cond = true;
	i = 0;

	while (i < N)
	{
		j = 0;
		while (j < M)
		{
			if (C[i][j] != foo[i])
			{
				cond = false;
				break;
			}
			j++;
		}
		i++;
	}

	if (cond == false)
		printf("NO\n");

	else
	{
		i = 0;
		j = 1;

		while (j < N)
		{
			if (foo[i] == foo[j])
			{
				cond = false;
				break;
			}
			i++;
			j++;
		}

		if (cond == false)
			printf("NO\n");
		else
			printf("YES\n");
	}

	return 0;
}
